app.dticlustering.training.run_sprites_training¶

app.dticlustering.training.run_sprites_training(clustering_id: str, dataset_id: str, parameters: dict, logger: ~app.shared.utils.logging.TJobLogger | ~typing.Type[~app.shared.utils.logging.LoggerHelper] = <class 'app.shared.utils.logging.LoggerHelper'>) → Path¶

Main function to run DTI sprites training

Parameters: - clustering_id: the ID of the clustering task - dataset_id: the ID of the dataset - parameters: an object containing the training parameters (for now: n_prototypes, transformation_sequence, background_option) - logger: a logger object
